page.title: 07Small Businesses
page.content: There are a number of small businesses in Milborne Port,they range from one man operations to concerns which employ a dozen people.A survey showed that most of these businesses employed local people but that several were run by people from outside the village. About 25% of the concerns were run by women,these tended to be catering , cleaning or selling agencies.There are also a small number of women doing outwork for local industries.The other 75% were run by men.Most of them were connected with the building trade such as plumbers,decorators,carpenters and bricklayers. When surveyed,most proprietors saw the area as a good one to work in but all of them complained about the poor postal services in the area.
